text: Aquabacterium olei is a Gram-negative, non-spore-forming and motile bacterium of the genus Aquabacterium which has been isolated from oil-contaminated soil in Korea. Aquabacterium olei can degrade oil. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Aquabacterium olei at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Burkholderiales Category:Bacteria described in 2015
title: Aquabacterium olei
